meaningMnemonic: A <kanji>difficult</kanji> <kanji>injustice</kanji> to take from someone is a <vocabulary>criticism</vocabulary>. Ugh, what a pain to be criticized! So difficult, and besides, it's an injustice, because I'm perfect!
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
